thread.title: Best Crêpes ever at breakfast
thread.title_full: Best Crêpes ever at breakfast - Review of BEST WESTERN PREMIER Faubourg 88, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Bia57
title: Best Crêpes ever at breakfast
text: Five stars location, near Gare du Nord, Rue Lafayette, Metro 100 meters, good restaurants nearby and, of course, not to miss Lafayette Galeries. Comfortable bed, excellent breakfast, good natural orange juice and best crêpes ever in Paris.Free wi-fi good signal. Very nice and helpefull staff.
